firstHalf: Yes – PSG likely to score 1-2 goals early
analysis: Huge mismatch in French Cup semi-final. PSG will rotate slightly but still field top attackers. Dunkerque may struggle to contain them. Expect goals in both halves.
Madrid derby in Copa del Rey. High stakes, tight defense expected. Real to control possession, but Atletico's counters are dangerous.
Classic Serie A clash. Both teams in good form. Milan vulnerable to set-pieces; Juventus strong at home. Expect goals from both sides.
FA Cup quarter-final. Chelsea improving but still unstable at the back. Liverpool likely to press early. Goals expected from both teams.
Norwich is in better form but Sunderland has strong home support. A tight game is expected with few goals.
Both teams are unpredictable and capable of high-scoring matches. Pisa often scores early at home.
Red Star has been dominating this league and scores in nearly every first half. Safe pick.
Very balanced teams with good defenses. Low scoring match expected. Draw is also probable.
